title: Mesmeric induction for well-being 👁 Hypnotic Fascination 👁 Non-verbal hypnosis
description:
These images are from a Master class of Dr. Marco Paret in Nice, France. His students are practicing hypnotic fascination. Hypnotizing with the power of the gaze is an ancient technique. This technique of Fascination or hypnosis with the gaze is exclusively taught by Dr. Marco Paret. All these techniques are very beneficial for self-development and therapy work. Learn all of them in Dr. Marco Paret's non-verbal hypnosis school. 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
